Articles.Content:
The "Warbird Pelican" is a heavy bomber i made from stock parts, and it is filled with 228 BDArmory 500lb bombs. Also has 8 BDArmory Vulcan turrets.

It is very laggy, and you need the end of the runway to lift this heavy thing. Be careful when using this, as too sharp turns will tear it apart. I have a mediocre computer, and it runs at 2-3fps, and at 1/5 speed.

Key bindings:

1 Next Weapon

2 Guard Mode

3 Arm/Disarm Guard Systems

4 Open Bomb Bay

5 Drop Bombs

![ohu1e1.jpg](http://i57.tinypic.com/ohu1e1.jpg)

![6o1unr.jpg](http://i57.tinypic.com/6o1unr.jpg)

.craft file:

[http://http://www./download/3gu978a632eljjg/Warbird+Pelican+Mk_2+Mod+BDArmory+Heavy+Bomber.craft](http://www./download/3gu978a632eljjg/Warbird+Pelican+Mk_2+Mod+BDArmory+Heavy+Bomber.craft)

Have fun carpet bombing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

EDIT: It is the Mk.2 variant, not the Mk.1. Mk.1 had too few engines.

EDIT: Fixed the Download

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T17:03:52Z" title="03/07/2015 05:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by Master\_Evar**
Holy Mk82, Batman! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I like the WWIII loadout.

Oh. My. God. 

This is terrifying! Run for your lives, everyone!
